meanings.definition: a wild South American mammal related to the llama and alpaca.
meanings.sent1: The vicugnas grazed peacefully in the grassy meadow.
meanings.sent2: The vicugnas are known for their soft fur and gentle nature.
meanings.sent3: The vicugnas decided to have a dance party in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the playful leap of a vicugnas.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the vicugnas roaming freely left a lasting impression on the visitors.

meanings.definition: the wool of the vicugna, used in making fine fabrics.
meanings.sent1: She knitted a beautiful scarf using vicugnas wool.
meanings.sent2: The luxurious coat was made from the finest vicugnas fibers.
meanings.sent3: The fashion show featured a stunning dress made entirely of vicugnas wool.
meanings.sent4: His words were as soft and comforting as a blanket of vicugnas wool.
meanings.sent5: The touch of vicugnas wool against her skin was pure bliss.
